name: All Hallow's Candy
description:
Submission for the IGMC 2017.
It's a small game made by one person, with the spirit of Halloween!

Choose your teams costumes, and prepare for the Halloween night!

The base stats are themed around being scary, or scaring others.
Bravery is how long u can be scared, until you run away crying.
You can try to scare people, or startle them with screams. 
You have to pick which is best to use.

Costume choices are; Vampire, Werewolf, Witch, Zombie, Mummy, and Ghost!
Each costume comes with its unique perks!

Zombies: Easily described as Tanky. Specialty is making other target them.
Bravery:           +++
Energy:             +
Scare:                +++
Scream:            +
Speed:               +

Mummies: Good in every stat except Speed and Energy. They have AoE screams.
Bravery:           +++
Energy:             +
Scare:                +++
Scream:            +++
Speed:               +

Witches: They have many options in screaming, including AoE.
Bravery:           +
Energy:             +++
Scare:                +
Scream:            +++
Speed:               ++

Ghosts: They are the most effected by scares, but their own sheets help make them feel hidden and safe, then they regain energy back, and their screams can't be ignored!
Bravery:           
Energy:             +++
Scare:                
Scream:            +++
Speed:               ++

Werewolves: They are quick, and can prevent surprises! They can also sacrifice their turn to grant additional turns to their friends!
Bravery:           ++
Energy:             ++
Scare:                ++
Scream:            ++
Speed:               +++

Vampires: Jack of all trades in stats, and can use either scares, or screams! They also regain bravery over time.
Bravery:           ++
Energy:             ++
Scare:                ++
Scream:            ++
Speed:               ++

GAME CONTROLS
Spacebar = Confirm
Escape = Cancel/Menu
Shift = Run
Arrows = Movement/UI Selection.
